text: William Dressler may refer to: * William F. Dressler (fl. 1917), businessman and Nevada state senator * William Dressler (cardiologist) (1890–1969) * William Dressler (anthropologist) (born 1951) ==See also== * Willy Oskar Dressler (1876–1954), German writer on art and interior decoration
title: William Dressler
